Posts.Content: well Happy Cancerversary to you!!!! My 2 yr is the 17th :)
and Im tired of not having independence to do what I want when I want, even if that means just garage sales or walking around Target for an hour or so :( Cancer just plain SUCKS!
Posts.Title: Because some things aren't suitable for Facebook...

Posts.Content: I'm tired of everyone freaking out when I say I'm tired, I can just be tired from normal life, right????
Posts.Title: Because some things aren't suitable for Facebook...

Posts.Content: Could not have said it better myself!!!!! {{{{{hugggsss}}}}}
Posts.Title: Because some things aren't suitable for Facebook...

Posts.Content: I say its his job hes on call so CALL! I dislike the inconsideration we get from these docs sometimes. When I worked, I was a family law paralegal, I always reminded myself, I have assisted thousands of people through their divorce but to this client this is their, hopefully, only divorce and try to keep my compassion, even when its the same o same o to me, it was not to them. Hope your feeling better :)
Posts.Title: on call doctor out of line or not? your take ladies!

Posts.Content: I never know what to say to people in these situtations. I hold your family in my heart and pray for peace for all of you.
Posts.Title: Lesley is home

Posts.Content: Posted some new pics of my head with staples in it! Not for the squmish also one of my baldness and of my brain MRI
Posts.Title: New expressions

Posts.Content: never have been sent for a MRI from them but have been given a shot for them and been told to eat more red meat. I know the red and white cells are effected by the chemo drugs. When the white is low you are more likely to get sick from low ammune system.
Posts.Title: what exactly does low red blood cells mean?

Posts.Content: I went Monday it was SO MUCH FUN!! I got some wonderful products and really good make up tips. Also a cute hat and an ugly scarf LOL but it was really really fun!!! You will LOVE it. FYI: wear no make up
Posts.Title: Going to Look Good Feel Better tonight!

Posts.Content: Pat, what a BEAUTIFUL poem I just love it :) Thomas, still thinking of you and your family praying for peace and comfort.
Posts.Title: Lesley is home

Posts.Content: this site has gotten very slow, also why I dont come by much!!!!
Posts.Title: Treatment plans, Side Effects, you Kindreds know, the usual!!!

Posts.Content: this board really needs a LIKE button!!! So well said. None of us want to be here but I am so lucky to have my pink sisters!!! Love you all!!!!! Libby
Posts.Title: Do you want to know something sisters in pink?

Posts.Content: purple power port here and I am also rocken an ommaya resievoir (sp) in my head. The last time I had sugery they used my power port for everything didnt get stuck once!!! I was so worried about getting the port but so so glad I did. Makes everything so much easier and less painful!!! I've had it accessed with and without the spray its practically painless with the spray and stings a little without it. The nurse did miss it one time and that was super painful and sometimes it pinches a little when its first accessed. The ommaya access is painless believe it or not!
Posts.Title: any thoughts on portacaths?

Posts.Content: this board really needs a LIKE button!!! So well said. None of us want to be here but I am so lucky to have my pink sisters!!! Love you all!!!!! Libby
Posts.Title: Do you want to know something sisters in pink?

Posts.Content: well come to Texas my brother will make you a deal!!!
Posts.Title: Aortus and his new car .. Joe here are a few suggestions for you, from your fellow Kindered Spirits

Posts.Content: Tessa my 4 year old granddaughter when I'm strong enough to walk without a walker or even hold her she says "Gammie do you still have cancer" melts my heart everytime!!! We went out to lunch and I stepped off the curb and kinda wobbled a little and she said Gammie wait hold my hand your freaking me out man!!! Love that kid!!!!!
Posts.Title: the funny things kids say...

Posts.Content: O Momma G :( I'm crying for you my sister. Mine is also there any questions I will share my experiences with you just ask. So so sorry!!!! xoxo ♥♥♥♥ Libby
Posts.Title: it's back again....... in my spinal fluid

Posts.Content: yes had a spinal tap and sorry to tell you its been the most painful procedure Ive had yet! The spinal fluid also is the fluid around the brain so I think thats where the concern lies. So far my brain is clear! Hoping it stays that way!!!!! When I get my treatments they pull fluid and test it. From what I understand its either positive or negative there is no # associated with the fluid. The spinal tap tech told me that my fluid was an "off color" not sure what he meant my that, and that fluid was negative. Its all very confusing!!!!
Posts.Title: DOES IT EVER STOP????

Posts.Content: OOOOOOO I am thrilled you got it and loved it and how perfect the pig was. I have to admit I bought one for myself too ;) I loved the boot and had to include that one! I am so glad you received it just in time to decorate you tree!!! soooooo thrilledddddd, ♥ Libby p.s. I was so excited I closed up the package then noticed a note I wrote to you sitting on the table ---- sorry!
Posts.Title: ~~~~Thank you Sooooooo Much Pinkflutterby!!!~~~~

Posts.Content: well said Sylvia :)
Posts.Title: DOES IT EVER STOP????

Posts.Content: I never had any redness or burns at all :) hope it goes the same for you!!! Libby
Posts.Title: radiation,10 treatments down.When is the normal to get burns from it?

Posts.Content: Im so sorry! I have cancer in my spinal fluid as well. I have seizures and sometimes totally black out. I get treatment in my head by way of of an ommaya reservoir once a month. When I have a seizure and dont black out Im told I say things that are incoherent. I have not had the droopy face but have had my vision blurred and sometimes double vision. Good luck to you and your wife and keep us in touch :) ♥ and (((huggsss)))
Posts.Title: DOES IT EVER STOP????

Posts.Content: Mine is Jan 17th :)
Posts.Title: When is Your Birthday?

Posts.Content: the spinal tap a/k/a lumbar puncture is PAINFUL dont let anyone tell you different!!!
Posts.Title: btw.....

Posts.Content: what a heart warming letter :) I am guilty of using the term beast - I will try to think of an alternative, I personally do not like it either! Pink Princess is nice. Has chen posted anything yet? She probably has no results. ♥ Libby
Posts.Title: My Message to Chenhart

Posts.Content: Mine is Jan 17th :)
Posts.Title: When is Your Birthday?

Posts.Content: Hi Peggy, I am also stage IV, diagnosed on March 17, 2009. in December my tumor markers jumped up to 42.7 (low this summer was 17, high when diagnosed 77). Last week I had a pet scan and a bone scan to explain the jump. I relate to your fears. Maybe they can shoot your hip with radiation? My mets are widespread in my bones. Was in my liver, totally clear now and my breast tumor is also gone! But sadly its still in my bones. Please keep us posted!! Libby
Posts.Title: Stage 4 and recent MRI scan not good.....

Posts.Content: Me too Heidi!! Thinking praying and wondering about you! Update us when you can. {{{hugs}}} Libby
Posts.Title: I've been thinking about you Heidi - Please post when you can.

Posts.Content: Anyone been told not to drive? Since I have had seizures I cant drive and I hate it!!!
Posts.Title: driving

Posts.Content: DONE!!!!

Posts.Content: DONE!!!!
Posts.Title: Please just say a little prayer....

Posts.Content: Hey all :) Well I had the port put in my head THENNNNNNNN had some seziures and had to be put in back the hospital been staying with my momma again to get strong back on the darn walker because Im unsteady on my feet have I ever shared how bad I HATE being sick? lol The treatment in the headport is a breeze. TTYL ♥ Libby
